desc: Lota is a free online EPUB reader, support all platforms (Web, Windows, Linux, MacOS, Android, iOS). Read multiple books at the same time. Read seamlessly between different devices.

0.title: Progressive web app
0.desc: Lota is progressive web app (PWA), which means it is cross-platform and installable.

1.title: Grid layout
1.desc: Lota supports (horizontal) grid layout, which allows you to read multiple books at the same time.

2.title: Custom cloud storage
2.desc: Store your books, notes, reading progress and even other data in the cloud you specified.

0.a: Your data is stored locally in your browser. If you upload a book, there will be a remote copy in the cloud.

1.a: For local data, clear the browser cache. For remote data, select and delete the book you want to clear (this will also clear the local one).
